description.value: A CodeSystem to identify the reason for the Failsafe Alert.

display.value: Health Visiting Service not allocated. Individual has not been associated with a Health Visiting Service
CHO Service not allocated. Individual has not been associated with a CHO Service
GP Service not registered. Individual has not been registered with a GP Service
Maternity Service not allocated. Individual has not been associated with a Maternity Service
School Nursing Service not allocated. Individual has not been associated with a School Nursing Service
Health Visiting Service - transfer of care required. Individual has an incorrect allocation with a Health Visiting Service based on their latest address
CHO Service - transfer of care required. Individual has an incorrect allocation with a CHO Service based on their latest address
CHO Service - transfer of care required. Individual has an incorrect allocation with a CHO Service based on their GP registration
